    static double
    singularThreshold(no.uib.cipr.matrix.SVD svd)
    Returns a reasonable threshold for singular values.

    tol = max (size (A)) * largest sigma * eps; The implementation is adapted from the EJML project https://github.com/lessthanoptimal/ejml/blob/69baa142637e2adf45d90722cf785fabe3d74fe0/main/dense64/src/org/ejml/ops/SingularOps.java which has copyright: Copyright (c) 2009-2014, Peter Abeles.

  • Method Details

    • eigenWithErrorFilter

      public static Object[] eigenWithErrorFilter(no.uib.cipr.matrix.DenseMatrix m)
      performs eigenvalue decomposition, checks the matrix products and returns those real vectors that pass the real product tests. Also returns their eigenvalues. new Object[]{rightEigenVector, eigenValues] as DenseMatrix and TDoubleList. Note that the results are also filtered for uniqueness.
      Parameters:
      m -
      Returns:

    • calculateRotationMatrix

      public static no.uib.cipr.matrix.DenseMatrix calculateRotationMatrix(double yaw, double pitch, double roll)
      extract yaw, pitch, and roll from a 3X3 rotation matrix 
           euler rotations

        about z-axis (yaw):           about x-axis (roll):       about the y-axis (pitch):
            | cos φ   -sin φ    0 |    |    1       0       0 |  |  cos ψ    0  sin ψ |
            | sin φ    cos φ    0 |    |    0   cos θ   sin θ |  |      0    1      0 |
            |     0       0    1 |    |     0  -sin θ   cos θ |  | -sin ψ    0  cos ψ |
      Parameters:
      rotMatrix -
      Returns:

    • calculateRotationMatrix

      protected static no.uib.cipr.matrix.DenseMatrix calculateRotationMatrix(no.uib.cipr.matrix.DenseMatrix m, double yaw, double pitch, double roll)

    • printMatrix

      public static String printMatrix(double[][] params)

    • transformToZeroBasedClasses

      public static int transformToZeroBasedClasses(no.uib.cipr.matrix.DenseMatrix classes)
      given a one dimensional matrix of integer class numbers, modify the matrix to start class number at zero and use intervals of value 1 and return the number of classes. For example, a matrix containing [1, 2, 5] would be transformed to [0, 1, 2] and return the value 3.
      Parameters:
      classes -
      Returns:

    • nullSpace

      public static no.uib.cipr.matrix.DenseMatrix nullSpace(no.uib.cipr.matrix.SVD svd)
      extract the null space from the SVD matrix. The null space the non-zero vector x in which all solutions to the original matrix A * x = 0.
      Parameters:
      svd -
      Returns:

    • singularThreshold

      public static double singularThreshold(no.uib.cipr.matrix.SVD svd)
      Returns a reasonable threshold for singular values.

      tol = max (size (A)) * largest sigma * eps; The implementation is adapted from the EJML project https://github.com/lessthanoptimal/ejml/blob/69baa142637e2adf45d90722cf785fabe3d74fe0/main/dense64/src/org/ejml/ops/SingularOps.java which has copyright: Copyright (c) 2009-2014, Peter Abeles. See the License for the specific language governing permissions and limitations under the License.
      Parameters:
      svd -
      Returns:
